paper_abstract: We report a novel microwave-assisted protocol for the synthesis of hitherto unknown 11-membered ring lignan lactone aza-analogues. The two key steps involve the formation of the biaryl fragment using a microwave-assisted Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling reaction and a thermal 1,3-dipolar Huisgen cycloaddition reaction for the introduction of the 1,2,3-triazole ring rendering the cyclized compound.
paper_title: Synthesis of ring-expanded aza-analogues of bisbenzocyclooctadiene lignan lactones
